abstract: China’s cabinet decided to continue the breaks for small and very small enterprises through 2016 and said it was considering significantly broadening them.
snippet: China’s cabinet decided to continue the breaks for small and very small enterprises through 2016 and said it was considering significantly broadening them.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — The Chinese government on Wednesday announced a modest package of economic stimulus measures, the latest sign of concern by Beijing that growth may be slowing more than expected.

headline.main: China Extends Tax Break Program to Spur Economy
headline.print_headline: China Extends Tax Break Program to Spur Economy
